meanings.definition: The state or quality of being anonymous.
meanings.sent1: The anonymousness of the online forum allowed people to share their thoughts freely.
meanings.sent2: Her anonymousness at the masked ball intrigued many guests.
meanings.sent3: The detective tried to uncover the anonymousness of the mysterious caller.
meanings.sent4: In a world of constant exposure, she cherished the anonymousness of her small village.
meanings.sent5: The cloak of anonymousness shielded his true identity from prying eyes.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unknown or unidentified.
meanings.sent1: The anonymousness of the sender made the recipient curious about the message.
meanings.sent2: The anonymousness of the graffiti artist added an air of mystery to the city streets.
meanings.sent3: The anonymousness of the gift left on her desk puzzled her coworkers.
meanings.sent4: The anonymousness of the donor's contribution touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The anonymousness of the author's identity sparked speculation among readers.
